70010000013639.description:
You will be entangled in a terrifying adventure of a priest on a quest to prove his innocence. Guilty or not, you find yourself trapped in the middle of strange events involving a demonic possession and divine apparitions. 

Each time you remember the boy or hear about being accused of murder, you go into a trance fueled by fear. These moments of madness depict gore, repulsion towards God, and sometimes even the voice of the devil himself trying to convince you of things that may or may not be lies...

Gray Dawn takes place around the year 1920,  in a remote village in England. Throughout the game, you will often be transported to the beautiful world of Romania, which is inspired by the mysticism of Eastern Europe.
70010000013639.intro: Embark on a terrifying adventure of a priest accused of murdering an altar boy.
70010000013639.name: Gray Dawn

70010000067866.description:
Get whiskered away on a hearty catventure in Cat Quest III, the third installment in the award-winning Cat Quest series!

Play as a swashbuckling purrivateer in this 2.5D open-world action RPG set in a fantastical pirate-themed world – the Purribean - an archipelago swarming with Pi-rats searching for the Northern Star - a long-lost mythical treasure. Alongside your trusty spirit companion, set sail through the Purribean in your very own ship! But beware, the seas are dangerous, and a meow-tiny is nigh as the hordes of Pi-rats under the order of the Pirate King hunt you down…

RETURN OF THE CAT
The cutest action RPG you know and love returns for a colorful adventure filled with furr-iously fun gameplay! Delve into a paw-geous new world with varied dungeons and biomes to explore, and encounter fierce battles with the newly refined combat system featuring tighter attack combos and weapon swapping. Playable in either solo or local co-op!

SAIL THROUGH THE PURRIBEAN
For the furr-st time in the series, sail the seas and battle in your very own ship! Explore the waters on your ship, seamlessly zip to shore, and traverse the land on paw to hunt booty in the paw-esome pirate world - the Purribean! There's treasures galore to be found, including new weapons, like the blunderpuss, furr-ocious spells, gla-meow-rous costumes, and more!

X MARKS THE SPOT
Embark on your very own treasure hunt and craft your own story with complete furr-eedom! Choose to explore the deepest corners of the Purribean at your leisure, or say ahoy to a quirky cast of characters and aid them in their quests along the way, in any order! The meow-steries of the Northern Star reach far and wide, and it’s up to you to investigate, gather clues and uncover the many secrets of the Purribean. This (cat’s) tale is yours to make, so weigh anchor and let’s go!
70010000067866.intro: Set sail on a purrfect catventure!
70010000067866.name: Cat Quest III

70010000069692.description:
PumPum is a casual game for adults with simple, relaxing gameplay, and features many sexy girls in different poses. Each girl shows off lovely graphics and animations! 
What you will find in the game: 
- Beautiful animations of girls. 
- Can be played with one hand. 
- Player vs. Player, Endless and Gallery play modes.
- Awesome sound and visual effects. 
- Gallery with hot pictures of girls. 
- Lots of levels to play. 
 Outstanding artwork, sexy girls, and easy to play! What else could you possibly need for a great gaming experience? If you love hentai animated girls, than PumPum is meant for you!
70010000069692.intro: PumPum is an addictive hentai puzzle game with many hot girls that you must collect! Each girl shows off lovely graphics and animations!
70010000069692.name: PumPum

70010000069787.description:
Get ready for a captivating adventure in pursuit of magical expertise! Embark on the challenging realm of Sokomage, a top-down logic puzzle game that will truly test the limits of your intellect.

In this demanding sokoban-style puzzle, you will step into the shoes of an aspiring wizard determined to attain the status of a genuine sorcerer. Conquer intricate obstacles and immerse yourself in thought-provoking puzzles to demonstrate that your mind is as sharp as a magical blade.

Utilize your cunning and dexterity to wield your staff with precision, pushing blocks to plug gaps, navigating hazards, and carving your path through elaborate mazes to reach the coveted magical crystal. Only then can you harness the energy necessary to evolve into a true master of the arcane arts.

Sokomage provides a visually enthralling and intellectually taxing experience, where each level serves as a testament to your cleverness and insight. Explore a realm brimming with ingenious puzzles and relish an exhilarating journey towards mastering the art of magic.

Prepare to confront challenges, unveil secrets, and tread the path that leads to greatness. Are you prepared to become a bona fide sorcerer? Uncover it in Sokomage, where the synergy of logic and magic intertwines in an extraordinary adventure!
70010000069787.intro: Sokomage is a brand-new Top-Down puzzle game that will really challenge your wits. Give rocks a nudge, steer clear of the bushes, and strike the crystal to make it to the finish!
70010000069787.name: Sokomage

70010000074758.description:
VIVIDLOPE, the manic 3D arcade game with a puzzle spin, is coming to Nintendo Switch™!

Join Cerise on her journey through the strange realm of VIVIDSCAPE. Here, the gravity is totally off the wall. Turn the world upside down as you run on ceilings, collect powerful items, fend off waves of enemies, and paint tiles. Plan ahead, but stay alert and react, as the foes keep coming from all directions - north, south, east, west, even top and bottom
- watching your back might not be enough!

- IT'S A COLOR FRENZY - paint the target % of tiles and clear the stage!
- STORY MODE - featuring animated cutscenes and the Atrium hub with a chatty weirdo galore.
- ENDLESS MODE - don't stop 'til you drop!
- 3 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS - with unique playstyles - defense, speed, or offense?
- RANK SYSTEM - go for the best one!
- ATTIRES - get the most stylish hat!
- A slew of extras to discover!
70010000074758.intro: Rapid Gravity Arcade Action! Dash! Spin! Slam! Paint!
70010000074758.name: VIVIDLOPE

70010000076702.description:
Set in a Japanese mall, Omochapon is a 3D puzzle platformer incorporating casual light-hearted gameplay with adorable characters. 

For each new toy unlocked, players gain abilities to explore the world and find new companions with the goal of escaping to the outside world. 

From first-time developer ShawnTheMiller, Omochapon is a wholesome title incorporating capsule toy culture and casual gameplay mechanics!

GAME FEATURES
・Drive, Jump, Roll, Glide & More with six unique capsule toys!

・Find as many tokens as you can to unlock new toys and new abilities!

・Explore a vibrant and colorful Mall, including a Toy Store, Supermarket, Train Station, and more!

・Look closely and be sure to find all the hidden capsule toys throughout the mall, collect all the variations & play as your favorites!

・There are dangers lurking everywhere, look out for the ventilation fans, gas stoves, cleaning robots, and more! Be careful and proceed with caution!
70010000076702.intro:
Omochapon is a little packet of fun!
Drive, Jump, Roll, Glide & Collect all your little capsule toy 
companions in this wholesome 3D puzzle adventure!
70010000076702.name: Omochapon

70010000077619.description:
Spin a new tale of the Jura Tempest Federation together with all your favorite characters from the animated series!

• Action-Packed Battles with Exhilarating Combo Attacks
Players can enjoy thrilling action battles that combine flashy special moves and powerful combos. Through leveling up bonds with friends, Rimuru will learn Special Attacks, and even have allies join in to back up Rimiru’s attack. Finish off formidable enemies that are coming to destroy Tempest with Secret Skills animated in retro 8-bit style!

• Experience Stories from the Anime, as well as All-New Adventures
Relive the original story from the encounter with the Kijin to the battle against the Kingdom of Falmuth fully voiced! In addition, there are two brand new adventures from the original author for fans to enjoy! 

Goblin's Revenge Arc:
Kataki is a bugbear who lost his friends in an attack by the Direwolves. The story of his revenge begins when he discovers that his former enemies and the Hobgoblins coexist in Tempest.

Religious Nation Arc:
The Theocracy of Angels is a mysterious religious nation that believes in angels. Aiming to take the power of the Storm Dragon, they face off with Tempest.

• Exciting City-Building
As players progress through the story and meet new allies, their community will grow from a small village to a great nation. Build a wide variety of buildings to take advantage of the Tempest Resonance which strengthens residents as you create more structures in your village! There are even modern Japanese-style buildings that make use of Rimuru's memory from the world before his reincarnation.

There are also more than 50 original subquests to enjoy! Enjoy the daily life in Tempest with laughter and tears as Rimuru and his friends work together to solve residents' problems and make the country a better place.
70010000077619.intro: Experience a slice of the Jura Tempest Federation life with friends
70010000077619.name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime ISEKAI Chronicles

70010000078624.description:
For our last summer at Seisho Music Academy...
With the 101st Seisho Festival's Starlight
just around the corner...
The students of the 99th Class decide to take up the challenge of performing Japan's most famous play,
the ocean-spanning tragedy of El Dorado.

The son of an exiled,
disgraced admiral: Salvatore Guglie.
The heir of an up-and-coming Spanish aristocrat:
Alejandro Javier Cavallero Cruz.
This story has two leads...
Who will we choose to play those roles?

The curtain is rising on the 99th Class's next stage,
as they ready to set sail across their own oceans.
70010000078624.intro:
- The vast ocean sings to me, I must go and conquer it-
Enjoy the new theatrical experience on Nintendo Switch™!
70010000078624.name: Revue Starlight El Dorado

70010000079271.description:
All is not well on the waves, a crisis is brewing. A water crisis! Mysteriously, this precious resource has turned deadly, corroding metal limbs and mechanical hearts. 

Take charge as Captain Leeway joined by his ragtag crew of Steambots to uncover the enigmatic menace threatening the Great Sea.

AIM 
In the heat of battle, precision is key. Take aim and let your shots ricochet with deadly accuracy. Every move counts as you strategise your way to victory, using your environment to your advantage and bouncing bullets off surfaces to outmaneuver your enemies.

PLOT
As Captain, you hold the fate of your crew in your hands. Equip them with different weapons, customise their abilities and equipment, and use the rich job system to overcome any challenge that comes your way. From seasoned veterans to eager recruits, your crew looks to you for guidance as you navigate the dangers of the Great Sea.

PLUNDER
Set sail and explore the vast ocean blue, where adventure, mystery, and danger await beyond each breaking wave... Engage in real-time naval combat, raid enemy bases and seize valuable loot to bolster your crew's strength. And when the battles are won, take respite at one of the lively bars where you can relax, upgrade your gear and crew, and forge new alliances with fellow bots.

Features:
- Experience thrilling free aiming and satisfying ricochet gameplay in turn-based Steambot combat. Plan your shots strategically to set up the perfect ricochet sequence for ultimate satisfaction.
- Embark on expansive world exploration with real-time naval combat, immersing yourself in the various challenges of the Great Sea.
- Dive deep into a rich job system and customise your crew to suit your playstyle, with over 150 guns, utility items, and ship equipment to choose from.
- Immerse yourself in a world brought to life by handcrafted characters and environments, accompanied by a captivating soundtrack and songs by songs by our returning, beloved troubadours, Steam Powered Giraffe. Let the music and sounds sink into your mind, leaving an unforgettable impression for days to come.
70010000079271.intro: Aim, plot, and plunder in this uproarious Steambot adventure!
70010000079271.name: SteamWorld Heist II

70010000080472.description:
Dive into the vibrant world of  an enthralling anime idol dance game that invites you to join the journey of nine unique idols, each with their own dreams, outfits, favorite locations and favorite songs. 
In this captivating adventure, you'll have the chance to dance alongside your favorite characters through 35 mesmerizing levels, each offering two distinct difficulties to challenge and delight players of all skill levels.
As you step into the glittering shoes of each idol, you'll dance your way through a variety of enchanting stages, from the dazzling nightclub to the serene, starlit nights over the roofs of the city. With every beat and rhythm, immerse yourself in the thrilling gameplay that combines intuitive controls with exhilarating music tracks, ensuring every performance feels as thrilling as a live concert.
But the rewards are as sweet as the journey! 
With each level you conquer, unlock breathtaking images of your character dancing, capturing their spirit and passion in stunning visuals that celebrate your progress. These exclusive images not only serve as tokens of your achievements but also deepen your connection with the characters, offering glimpses into their lives and dreams. 
It is a journey through a world full of fun, dancing, and anime, wrapped in a dazzling package of music, and exciting visuals. Whether you're a seasoned rhythm game aficionado or a newcomer eager to explore the world of anime idols, this game promises an unforgettable experience, blending the thrill of performance with the heartwarming tales of ambition, friendship, and success. 
Join us on this dazzling adventure, and let the rhythm lead the way to stardom!
70010000080472.intro: Step into a universe where music and movement collide in a spectacular party experience for seasoned rhythm gamers and newcomers.
70010000080472.name: Anime Dance-Off - Party Total

70010000080733.description:
Demon Go! is a side-scrolling runner action game where players use simple controls to quickly maneuver through various stages.

The road to cat heaven, filled with all the world's kitties, is a rough one. Help the little demon reach the utopia he has longed for!

<Game intro>

▶ Quickly and eagerly, go forward and forward some more!
Use only Jump and Dash to charge forward nonstop! Use these two actions to run away from or defeat the demons to reach kitty heaven!

▶ Action-packed escape featuring a host of gimmicks!
Take advantage of the gimmicks featured on each stage! Jump through the air, blow your enemies away, and more as you use the simple controls to navigate all that action!

▶ Use items to clear stages easier!
Gather all the gold on each stage to unlock a host of items! The hell store sells items with a variety of different abilities. Form your own combination of items to combat each stage!

▶ To utopia with the kitties!
Escape hell with the scattered kitties that have lost their way! Rescued cats follow the little demon to the end of the stage. During your flight through hell, maybe you'll even find a few peculiar ones.
70010000080733.intro: The story of a little demon escaping hell because it's so hellish! Will the little one be able to overcome fearsome obstacles and arrive safely in kitty heaven?
70010000080733.name: Demon Go!

70010000081162.description:
This cute puzzle game will kick your butt! Behind the sweet pastels of Billy Bumbum lie puzzles for the true thinky mind. Use seemingly simple mechanics in surprisingly deep and satisfying ways to rescue your friends in over 250 levels. Fart for Freedom!

Features:
* Over 250 puzzles crafted by puzzle experts from the Thinky community
* Seemingly simple yet surprisingly deep mechanics that interact in satisfying ways
* An overworld map with branching paths to new worlds
* Fully animated 2D cutscenes and tons of narrative to uncover.
* The most solid soundtrack you’ll ever hear in a puzzle game. No joke.
70010000081162.intro: Can you handle the toots? Billy Bumbum's charming world hides a puzzler's paradise!
70010000081162.name: Billy Bumbum: A Cheeky Puzzler

70010000081805.description:
Delirium is a first-person graphic adventure in which we control teenage rebel Lola. Like Lola, our main objective will be to escape from Delirium along with her freak brother Danny, who will accompany us during the adventure. 

To do this, we must put all our ingenuity in solving fun puzzles, explore unusual scenarios and meet peculiar characters. In Delirium we will be able to interact with the stage to examine objects, pick them up and also combine them with other different ones in order to advance in the story. 

With Lola and Danny we will live a whole adventure full of humor and full of references to pop culture, be it video games, comics, movies or series.

Features:

•	Graphic adventure.
•	Classic graphic adventure inventory.
•	A lot of puzzles to resolve.
•	Hilarious characters to meet.
•	Variety content, gags and easter eggs.
•	Cell-Shading graphic style.
•	Astonishing soundtrack.
70010000081805.intro: Solve puzzles and explore Lola and Danny's delirious house.
70010000081805.name: Delirium

70010000082794.description:
A brain-training art certification game that hones your mind.
It's a brain-training game where you can test your color perception with simple controls.

The gameplay is easy.
・Among the lined-up tiles, touch the one that has a different color.
・Simply find and touch it within the time limit.

If you find it difficult, you can use the hint feature to be told where it is.

The number of tiles ranges from 2x2 to 10x10!
Can you reach the highest level of difficulty...!?
70010000082794.intro: Challenge the limits of your color perception!
70010000082794.name: Color Sense Challenge

70010000083428.description:
"Love Is All Around" is a simulating love story real-life full-motion interactive video . You will not only meet but also fall in love with six beauties with completely different personalities and styles, eventually embark on an immersive and sweet journey one after another.
Under their charisma, how would you deal with the six beauties while you are busy at paying off debts? Would you  ignore your feelings and focus on making money? Or would you choose love over money? Among these beauties, who would you choose to be your partner for the rest of your life?

Is it the extremely charming ingenue girl?
Is it the mature girl with intellectual tenderness and gentleness?
Is it the innocent, lovely gamine girl?
If the above isn’t what’s in your mind, then there’s…
Unruly and willful, but slightly masochistic girl who born with a silver spoon!
Sexy, hot, and delicate goddess!
Noble and glamorous, a domineering female CEO who loves you solely!
There is always one that will make you fall in love with it! The right to choose a love one is now in your hands!

Product Features
·Full first-person perspective during the whole story, immersive experience of love -"Love Is All Around" is first-person perspective throughout, completely immersed in scene interaction and real-life simulation. It provides the immersive simulation experience, allows you to try more, and have an immersive love experience with the girl you like.

·Multiple branches, multiple endings, multiple hidden story lines and bonus scenes - the interactive video has designed more than a hundred story branches, twelve endings, multiple hidden story lines and bonus scenes for you, additionally, you can find  achievement system, mining and multiple experiences in product. In the product, make the choice that goes with your heart, rather than the correct choice.

·Acting by real actors , shooting in real-life scenes - numerous wonderful behind-the-scenes stories are waiting to be discovered, revealing the actor's understandings of the character's inner world, and unravel the secrets of flirting through girl’s perspective.

·Various ways to play, finding the faint clues - the game life is not limited to choices, the key clues of the follow-up plot can be hidden in the scene, faint clues can closely related to the ending. Maybe everything is predestined, but sometimes being brave will change your fate. Come and play out your story.

·Six girls with very different personalities can be introduced—either charming, or tender, or innocent, or capricious, or sexy, or glamorous, there is always a kind of girl that make you exclaim: " Damn it! I am surrounded by beauties! "

About Us
We are "intiny", we are all "split personality" nerds who want to have date every day, but will never step out of the house to the real world. Thereford, we would like use interactive video as tool to create one fantasy dream after another, to create dreams for players, and to make our dreams to come true for ourselves.
70010000083428.intro: Simulating Love Story Real-life Full-motion Interactive Video
70010000083428.name: Love is all around

70010000083860.description:
Your task is to control a high-tech drone and overcome challenging tracks filled with dangerous obstacles and unexpected surprises.

In each level you will encounter treacherous turns, narrow corridors, moving objects and other challenges that require extreme concentration and instant reaction. Control the drone with the precision of a surgeon to avoid collisions and successfully complete the route.

Stunning graphics and realistic flight physics create an immersive experience, making you feel like a real pilot. Additionally, the game includes timed modes where you compete against yourself and other players to achieve the best score in each level, and a challenge mode that offers unique skill and dexterity challenges.

GAME FEATURES:
• Real training of reaction and attentiveness
• Lots of levels with dangerous obstacles
• Detailed and realistic physics
70010000083860.intro: A realistic drone simulator that will challenge your reaction and alertness skills - welcome to extreme drone racing!
70010000083860.name: Drone Pilot: Extreme Flight Simulator

70010000083906.description:
Drop sushi onto the sushi geta below!
Pile them up, but be careful not to let them fall onto the counter!

[Score Attack]
Increase your score and aim for the top of the global leaderboards!

[Battle]
Drop sushi and battle with up to 4 players until only 1 player remains!
70010000083906.intro:
Drop sushi and stack them up!
Grow your sushi stack bigger and taller, and aim for a new high score!
70010000083906.name: SUSHI Drop

70010000083973.description:
"Through two doors at once."

▼About
This is a sci-fi mystery visual novel game. Each decision you make not only shapes your destiny but also peels back layers of hidden truths. Assemble the fragments of reality scattered across various outcomes to reconstruct the complete narrative. Dare to unravel the mysteries—your choices are the key to revealing the full spectrum of secrets.

▼Story
Plunged into the depths of despair, Haryuu Ryoushi finds himself compelled by dire circumstances to a hidden underground research facility. There, he encounters Kosakai Mio, his childhood friend thought dead for nearly a decade. As fragments of a forgotten summer surge through his memory, Ryoushi is thrust into a bewildering puzzle.
The uncanny revival of a long-lost friend, the unsettling bend of time, and a sequence of chilling murders within this isolated enclave... Ryoushi is forced to navigate through this maze of mysteries, seeking clues that might unravel his twisted fate.
Confined spaces and impenetrable locks, a chain of unexplained deaths; the bending of space-time, quantum entanglements, and experiments that challenge reality itself. Prepare for the science fiction mystery you've been longing for.

▼Features
Clear script structure, refined narrative, multi-round unlocking mechanism, blue silhouettes...
A return to origins, paying tribute to the classic form of visual novels.
70010000083973.intro: In a godless abyss, parallel worlds entwine like a maze. Where does one find the path to the sole universe of bliss?
70010000083973.name: Kanna Maze

70010000084041.description:
You take on the role of an elite agent of a special unit fighting terrorism around the world. Your mission is to eliminate dangerous enemies, free hostages and defuse deadly bombs to ensure safety and peace.

Each mission is a unique challenge that requires you to think strategically, accurately and quickly. You'll infiltrate fortified terrorist bases, liberate captured buildings, and neutralize threats in environments ranging from city streets to remote desert camps.

Your arsenal includes a wide range of weapons and equipment. Improve your skills and equipment to become even more effective in the fight against terrorists. Use tactics, coordinate your actions and make quick decisions to successfully complete each mission and save innocent lives.

GAME FEATURES:
- Dynamic first-person shooter gameplay;
- Special missions of varying complexity;
- Large arsenal of various weapons and equipment.
70010000084041.intro: Your mission is to eliminate enemies, free hostages and defuse bombs to ensure safety and peace in an exciting first-person shooter!
70010000084041.name: Tactical Strike: Special Forces Shooter

70010000084232.description:
Far beyond the golden sands, there once was a bloodline that ruled over Arguice. This is a tale from long ago. The winged ones descended upon the hills of Ateparu, where they entered an eternal slumber alongside the spirits of wind, earth, and water. After thousands of seasons, when calamity arises once more, the descendants of Arguice, wielding wings and swords, will vanquish the demons...

This RPG was released in 1988 in Japan. The player embarks on an adventure to save the world from the threat of demons as the 23rd prince of the Kingdom of Arguice.

Towns and dungeons are presented in a side view, while map navigation is shown in a top-down view.The game is lightweight and most actions can be performed using the numeric keypad, making movement and exploration feel like an action game.

Combat uses a semi-auto battle system with random encounters. You will watch your character and the monsters fight, issuing commands as needed based on the situation, resulting in a very immersive battle experience. Be vigilant, as inattentiveness can lead to dire situations.

One of the game's attractions is the included "Book of Wyverns." This booklet contains materials for decoding dungeon murals encountered during gameplay, as well as detailed monster descriptions. Spanning nearly 100 pages, it provides a rich and engaging read.

*This application does not have a scene select mode.
*The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
*Other menu screens and "How to play" screens are in English.
70010000084232.intro: The King of Arguice fell to the attack of the demonic creatures, leaving the world in ruins. The prince, having somehow survived, sets off on an adventure.
70010000084232.name: EGGCONSOLE ARGUICE NO TSUBASA  PC-8801mkIISR

70010000084418.description:
This game offers a delightful way to learn Japanese HIRAGANA through fill-in-the-blank puzzles.

How to play is simple:
・Pay close attention to the word meanings and illustrations provided.
・Select the appropriate HIRAGANA from the four options to fill in the blank.
・Drag the correct HIRAGANA with the finger icon to its place in the puzzle.

The game features a vast collection of aesthetically pleasing, popular, and practically useful HIRAGANA characters.
Learn the charms of HIRAGANA that will deepen your appreciation for Japanese culture through an engaging gaming experience!

Should you find it challenging, hints are available to guide you to the correct answer.
Perfect for anyone with a love for Japan or those looking to embark on their HIRAGANA learning journey.

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000084418.intro:
Discover Popular Beautiful HIRAGANA!
Study HIRAGANA Fun with Games
70010000084418.name: Slot & Learn HIRAGANA

70010000084423.description:
While being healed by the pictures of Japanese landscapes
You can easily train your brain with the pictures of Japanese landscapes.
There are a lot of pictures of Japanese landscapes!

Easy to play:
・Look closely at the """"upper"""" photo on the split screen.
・Find the difference between the bottom photo and the top photo.
・When you find the wrong place, touch it!

The hint button is only for when you just can't figure it out!
I give you a big hint that you can understand most of the puzzles.

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000084423.intro:
Find mistakes in Japanese landscapes!
Enjoy brain training while being healed by Japanese landscapes!
70010000084423.name: Train Your Brain! Spot the Difference with Japanese landscapes

70010000084731.description:
Cats Hidden in Magic Places is a fantastical adventure that cat lovers and fantasy fans will adore! Step into an extraordinary world filled with enchanting cities, mystical schools, and vibrant villages as you embark on a thrilling quest to find hidden cats. With ten stunning scenes to explore, each brimming with magical charm, the challenge is to uncover all 400 elusive felines!

Journey through a realm of wonder, where every picture depicts a magical location teeming with hidden surprises. From bustling enchanted markets to serene, spellbound forests and ancient, arcane academies, each scene is intricately crafted to captivate your imagination and sense of discovery.

But beware—the charm and enchantment of these places will test your keen eye and attention to detail! Seek out hidden cats in every corner, behind mystical artifacts, and amidst magical creatures. Each picture presents a new and exciting challenge to uncover all 40 hidden cats.

Whether you're a seasoned hidden object enthusiast or a cat lover in search of a mesmerizing escape, Cats Hidden in Magic Places promises hours of delightful and captivating entertainment. So, prepare to dive into a magical journey, sharpen your observation skills, and let the enchanting hunt for hidden cats begin!
70010000084731.intro: Discover hidden cats in enchanting cities, mystical schools, and diverse villages in Cats Hidden in Magic Places. Embark on a delightful adventure to find felines in these magical realms!
70010000084731.name: Cats Hidden in Magic Places

70010000084927.description:
This is a language learning game where you can learn German, French, and Italian simultaneously by matching words with the same meaning from each language in a puzzle format.

How to Play:
1.Read the given word carefully.
2.Slide the panels to rearrange them into the correct combinations.
3.By playing repeatedly, you will build a basic vocabulary in these languages.

If you find it difficult, press the hint button. 
It will show you the answer for one language, helping you in your learning process.

The game is packed with useful words for various situations!
Why not train your brain and become bilingual?

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000084927.intro:
Learn German, French, and Italian simultaneously!
The ultimate time-efficient learning puzzle game
70010000084927.name: Spin & Match Puzzle Learn at Once 3 Languages

70070000021912.description:
Embark on the full SteamWorld Heist adventure!

Play both SteamWorld Heist II, the next thrilling chapter in the story, and the original SteamWorld Heist in this complete bundle.

Including: 

SteamWorld Heist II 
Join Captain Leeway and his ragtag crew as they uncover the enigmatic menace threatening the Great Sea. Equip and upgrade your crew for turn-based gunfights packed with ricochet action and engage in real-time naval combat. Get ready to aim, plot, and plunder in this uproarious Steambot adventure!

SteamWorld Heist
In SteamWorld Heist you command robot pirates in epic tactical shootouts. It’s turn-based strategy with an action twist: By manually aiming your weapons you'll pull off insane bullet-bouncing trick shots!

SteamWorld Heist - The Outsider DLC
Captain Piper stumbles upon a new ally with a past shrouded in mystery. Dive into the action and take on new missions with brand-new weapons, gear and a shipload of hats!

SteamWorld Heist - Hatbox: Hatful Eight + 2 DLC
A lively bunch of hats that will surprise you with a life of their own. They’re cheaper than coffee, and certainly taste better!
70070000021912.name: SteamWorld Heist Complete Bundle

70010000082197.description:
After an unlucky adventurer encounters a cursed skull while exploring the remote deserts of Egypt, he suddenly falls into the clutches of the mysterious Pharaoh’s tomb.

Escaping from each challenging room involves solving a puzzle where you’ll aim a magic beam of light to open a magical locked door. You’ll have to contend with dangerous enemies, avoid outlandish traps, and even out-maneuver the chamber walls closing in.

Help our hero make it through each perilous puzzle, or be lost until eternity.

Features
* Puzzle platforming gameplay
* Ancient Egypt adventure setting
* Numerous puzzles, traps, and enemies
* Comic book-inspired art
70010000082197.intro: Escape the accursed ancient Pharaoh’s tomb
70010000082197.name: Escape from the Pharaoh's Tomb

70010000082595.description:
Bid Battle: Auction War Simulator Storage Hunter is an engaging game that immerses players in the competitive world of storage unit auctions. Inspired by the excitement and strategy of real-life auction hunting, this game lets players experience the thrill of bidding wars as they vie for abandoned storage units filled with hidden treasures. The objective is to outbid opponents, discover valuable items, and ultimately turn a profit by selling these finds.

Features:
- Realistic Auction Experience: Engage in dynamic auctions against other players. Use strategic bidding to secure valuable storage units.
- Treasure Hunting: Explore won storage units to find valuable items and treasures. Discover antiques, collectibles, and items for profit.
- Diverse Storage Units: Explore various storage spaces with unique themes and treasures. Units range from small lockers to large, diverse collections.
- Hidden Treasures and Rare Finds: Uncover a wide array of items, including rare collectibles and antiques. Experience the excitement of finding valuable items.
- Profit and Trade System: Evaluate and sell items to maximize profits. Use the in-game market for trading and collection improvement.
- Challenging Levels and Missions: Complete missions and levels to enhance your bidding skills. Earn rewards and unlock new auctions.
- Realistic Simulation: Immerse yourself in a realistic storage auction world.Experience authentic bidding dynamics and item discovery.
70010000082595.intro: Outbid, Explore, Profit! Unearth the treasures of the auction world!
70010000082595.name: Bid Battle: Auction War Simulator Storage Hunter

70010000084175.description:
Get ready for the ultimate showdown in Boom Robots! Dive into the action as you assemble and customize your dream team of robots, each packed with unique abilities and ready to dominate the battlefield. 

Strategize and outmaneuver your friends as you navigate tricky terrain, unleash devastating special attacks, and coordinate your team's moves to crush the competition. Every match is a thrilling spectacle of explosions and laser blasts, demanding sharp reflexes and clever tactics to claim victory.

After each electrifying battle, analyze your performance, tweak your strategy, and gear up for the next intense face-off. Boom Robots is the perfect blend of strategy, action, and excitement, delivering non-stop entertainment for gamers of all ages. Are you ready to lead your robots to glory?
70010000084175.intro: Join the fray and let the battles begin - up to 8 players in local multiplayer
70010000084175.name: Boom Robots

70070000023681.description: Have you ever dreamed of meeting dinosaurs and learning their secrets? Or would you like to see them in funny situations and see what they have to hide? Spy Guy Dinosaurs is another map in the Spy Guy series, where you can look for hidden objects, learn interesting facts from the world of dinosaurs and test your sharp eye.
70070000023681.intro: Discover the secrets of dinosaurs and embark on a journey through a mysterious land.
70070000023681.name: Spy Guy Animals Dino Edition

70010000082409.description:
Take control of a super sized bullet as it power across the water!

Dodge the obstacles and hit the rings for a perfect score

Enter frenzy mode and smash your way through walls and towering structures

Enjoy some bullet time!
70010000082409.name: Bullet Time

70070000023279.description:
Embark on a heart-pounding adventure with our newest release, Truckzilla - Monster Truck Mega Ramp: Premium Edition! Dive into a realm of high-speed thrills and mind-boggling stunts as you take the reins of the mightiest monster trucks. Our last Bundle combines the adrenaline-pumping action of the main game with the incredible advantages of the Money Boost - 1 Million DLC. Get ready to dominate the monster truck world with this perfect combination
Key Features:
	•	Thrilling Action: Navigate challenging ramps and obstacles at high speed.
	•	Crystal Collection: Collect mystical crystals for awesome bonuses.
	•	Unique Skins: Use our sticker system to unlock extraordinary truck skins.
	•	Special Missions: Complete special missions for exciting rewards.
	•	Financial Boost: Instantly gain 1 million in-game currency for upgrades and exclusive items.
With Truckzilla, your goal is to unlock all the exclusive skins for your vehicle and create the coolest garage ever seen. Hone your skills, compete with the best, and become a legendary monster truck racer.
70070000023279.intro: Master high-speed thrills and daring stunts, Unlock unique skins, conquer special missions, and earn more money in our new Bundle.
70070000023279.name: Truckzilla - Monster Truck Mega Ramp: Premium Edition

70070000023670.description:
Urban Flow is a game about the subtle beauty of city streets filled with cars moving in perfect harmony. But such order does not happen all by itself - the city needs YOU to control the traffic lights and to make sure everything goes smoothly. That means no crashes, no jams. Everything will run perfectly - as long as you stay focused!

Immerse yourself in a beautiful, hand-crafted, low-poly world to discover the enormous satisfaction of watching the hundreds of tiny, colorful cars flowing through the streets – all while listening to the chill, urban music.

Over 100 levels, each with its own busy intersection. You have one job: operate the lights and keep it safe.

Party Game (even if you party all alone!)
-----
 Play by yourself or with friends in scalable drop-in, drop-out local co-op mode for two, three, or four players!
You can help your friends or be a little rascal and spread the chaos!

Avoid accidents by paying close attention to special vehicles and to the other players. Special vehicles include the ambulance, which can’t wait for long, and the tank – which will plow through anything in its way.

Don’t want to play the campaign?
-----
 Try our score-based Endless Mode or the Chill Mode - where you play for as long as you want, no rush and no score - only you and the music. Urban Flow is designed to be a great single player experience!

Discover various environments and weather conditions. Play with touch controls, Pro Controllers or Joy-Con™ controllers. Complete challenges and unlock rewards.

Become one with the flow. The Urban Flow!

This bundle includes base game, London Rules and Streets Supplement #2 with:

•    5 new vehicles
•    The new rules and 10 new stages await you
70070000023670.intro: Manage the city lights and try to avoid the chaos!
70070000023670.name: Urban Flow Capital Commute

70070000023680.description:
Relax as you follow the numbers and paint at your own pace!

Dive into unique canvases full of unicorns, hearts, cakes, and other stunning images. Enjoy the satisfying 'click' as each diamond snaps into place, bringing vibrant colors to life!

Bring a dinosaur back from the past or draw a diamond castle in 3D - whatever you imagine, you can paint it... with diamonds!

Features: 
- Color by numbers over 900 pictures!
- Create beautiful 3D paintings
- Choose from different canvas sizes
- Make awesome diamond art
- Listen to relaxing ASMR

Watch your masterpiece sparkle with each diamond you place!
70070000023680.intro: Let your imagination shine as you create over 900 stunning paintings with diamonds!
70070000023680.name: Diamond Painting ASMR: Complete Edition

70070000023687.description:
Create tons of incredible fashion design looks for your clients and find them the perfect outfits for their big events! 

Welcome to Hollywood, the fabulous land of VIPs! Here, fashion rules, and all the amazing celebrities and fabulous models need to look their best to maintain their star status. That's where you come in - you're the stylist to the stars! Everyone's talking about the incredible looks you created at the latest red carpet event!

Your awesome reputation in fashion design is already bringing you fame and fortune! Lots of girls are heading to your stylist salon for fabulous fashion makeovers. Choose the perfect dress or outfit, add gorgeous accessories and fabulous shoes to complete the look! And don't forget to pick out a new hairstyle for your clients and make sure their nails are absolutely perfect!

Features:
- Open up your very own stylist salon and become famous!
- Style and dress up your clients in glamorous outfits!
- Help your clients get the prettiest makeovers the world has ever seen!
- Make sure their nails are perfect and complement them with rings and bracelets!
- Get your celebrity models amazing new hairstyles!
- 480 new clothing items in streetwear and summer style to make your clients look even more trendy!
- 14 new stunning hair colors and 7 hairstyles
- 94 new accessories such as glasses and jewelry
- 61 new makeup items 
- 49 new nail salon items 

Whether you're already a makeover fan or new to the genre, this game is bound to leave you amazed!
70070000023687.intro: Dress up famous models and VIP celebrities to bring out their best looks with fabulous makeovers!
70070000023687.name: Stylist Girl: Complete Edition

70070000023696.description:
It's time to change your watch for something unique and sensual.

Enjoy your day with the 12 most tempting girls, and check what they are doing as time passes.

This extraordinary timepiece allows you to fully express yourself by customizing the clock's display and background to reflect your unique personality and preferences.

Features:
- Time and date display
- Over 170 charming photos of 12 girls: Ivona, Slava, Anari, Kate, Liz, Mia, Nadia, Roxi, Samanta, Valeria, Xena and Yoko
- Plenty of customization options
- You won't take your eyes off it 

Transform your clock into a portal to the anime realm you love.
70070000023696.intro: Spend your time with beautiful anime girls posing just for you
70070000023696.name: Ecchi Time: Complete Edition

70010000082488.description:
How exciting can the routine of a 5th Dimensional librarian be?

In "The Books Tale: A Hop Adventure", players embark on an exciting journey as Verbum, a librarian from the 5th Dimension, whose mission is to rid the LibreArca library of a terrible threat: the Molds. These sinister creatures are corrupting the books of interdimensional knowledge, endangering the stability of the entire universe.

In a world made of blocks, providing a visually captivating environment full of mysteries, you must, to advance in the game, use your dexterity and reasoning to overcome complex obstacles and unravel the puzzle that is each chapter of the books.

You must find the right way to activate all the Totems, while eliminating the Molds, until you reach the portal to go to the next chapter.

Note that each Mold requires a different amount of Orbs to eliminate.

Each stage presents a unique set of challenges and environments, taking players into worlds beyond comprehension, filled with surreal landscapes and magical artifacts. The immersive narrative propels players to explore every corner of this extraordinary universe in order to gather energy and resources to purify books affected by Molds.

Get ready for a truly exciting gaming experience filled with interdimensional mysteries and thrilling challenges in "The Books Tale: A Hop Adventure". The LiberArca library is counting on you to restore order and protect interdimensional knowledge!

Are you ready for this unique and magical adventure?
70010000082488.intro: Unravel Mysteries, Overcome Complex Obstacles, and Solve the Puzzle! Rid the Library of a Terrible Threat.
70010000082488.name: The Books Tale: A hop adventure!

70010000083215.description:
Embark on an exhilarating journey in Project Moonshot, the must-play physics-based rocket game that will keep you hooked for hours!

Your Mission: Launch rockets carrying astronaut payloads to the Moon and, ultimately, Mars. Master the timing of each stage release using intuitive touch controls or a controller. Earn money from successful launches and invest it in upgrading rocket stages and spaceports. Personalise your rocket with dazzling new skins. The more astronauts you send to colonise planets, the bigger your payouts, letting you enjoy luxurious holidays on Earth!

Compete with Friends: Climb the ranks on the Global Champion Leaderboard and see who can launch the furthest!

Get ready for an out-of-this-world adventure with Project Moonshot!
70010000083215.intro: Blast off in Project Moonshot: The Addictive Rocket Adventure You Can't Put Down!
70010000083215.name: Moonshot

70010000085478.description:
Step into the shoes of a supermarket owner in Supermarket Manager 2024, a dynamic 3D supermarket simulator where your business acumen will be put to the test! As the proud proprietor, your goal is to grow your supermarket empire by making smart purchasing decisions and optimizing your sales strategies.

Key Features:
Business Growth: Purchase a variety of products from different providers and strategically price them to attract more customers and maximize profits.

Financial Management: Handle transactions with ease as customers pay with cash or credit cards. Use your earnings to invest back into your supermarket.

Upgrades and Expansion: Reinvent your supermarket with upgrades and expansions. Enhance your store's layout, stock more products, and improve customer satisfaction to become the leading supermarket in town.

Strategic Gameplay: Balance supply and demand, manage stock levels, and respond to customer preferences to keep your business thriving.

Immersive 3D Environment: Experience the bustling atmosphere of a supermarket with stunning 3D graphics and detailed animations.

Can you transform your modest store into a thriving retail giant? Find out in Supermarket Manager 2024, where every decision counts towards building your supermarket success story!
70010000085478.intro: Can you transform your modest store into a thriving retail giant?
70010000085478.name: Supermarket Manager 2024

70050000051260.description:
YAMAT, THE BREACH TRAVELER
Play as Yamat, a powerful Breach Traveler who has wandered through countless astral prisons created by the Master. She seeks to challenge the strongest fighters and prove her worth.

This new prisoner has a bold personality and harbors many mysteries. Her motivations and personal goals will unfold with each escape attempt.

WEAPONS
Yamat can use 3 different weapons types for different playstyles:
- Dark Energy Fists: Close-range quick attacks of dark matter, unleashing flaming magical creatures.
- Two-Handed Dark Sword: Long-range powerful slashes that can hit multiple enemies at once.
- Dark Bow: Long-range attacks that shower enemies with arrows.

SPELLS, PERKS AND PASSIVES
- 16 unique spells: Summon powerful wild creatures, unleash spinning giant blades, and more!
- Forbidden Power: With this Signature Spell, Yamat transforms into her flying draconic form, allowing her to move freely while shooting magic missiles at nearby enemies.
- 37 associated perks: Modify her Signature Spell to suit your playstyle.
- 9 weapon passives: Each weapon comes with 3 unique passives, making Yamat an even deadlier fighter.

OTHER CONTENT
- New Papa Yalee stories: 4 new stories that delve deeper into the mysterious Yamat.
- 1000+ new lines of dialogue: Interact with Yamat and all the other characters in the Garden, including heroes, fully voiced in English and Japanese.
- Cinematics and ending screens: New cinematics and a new ending screen has been added for Yamat!

HOW TO ACCESS YAMAT
If you have not yet met Yamat in the Garden, she will appear after a couple of escape attempts.

ADDITIONS TO THE BASE GAME
Even without owning this add-on content, you will still be able to:

- See Yamat hanging out in the Garden.
- Collect and use 2 Yamat Echoes during runs.
- Fight Yamat's Shadow Clone.
70050000051260.intro: Play as Yamat, a powerful dark mage summoning creatures, fighting with a bow and great sword!
70050000051260.name: Yamat - The Breach Traveler

70010000069398.description:
Beatbuddy interacts with the living breathing environment that pulses to the beat of an original soundtrack, aiding him as he unlocks new paths and solves puzzles.

KEY FEATURES

- Experience an action-adventure game in a whole new way, which incorporates music into every aspect of the vibrant world Symphonia.
- Six beautifully hand-painted levels, each broken into five chapters, take the player through the unique locations and vivid colour palettes.
- Featuring an exclusively produced soundtrack with original songs composed specifically for the game by known artists, including Austin Wintory, Parov Stelar, Sabrepulse and La Rochelle Band.
- Play as Beatbuddy, an ethereal creature who travels to unite with his sisters Melody and Harmony and stop the evil Prince Maestro with the aid of Clef, who provides comic relief throughout their journey.
70010000069398.intro: Awakened from his slumber, Beatbuddy journeys through lush hand-painted environments on a quest to save his companions and his own immortality.
70010000069398.name: Beatbuddy: Tale of the Guardians

70010000084398.description:
Hidden Through Time 2: Discovery is a cozy hidden object game that has you searching for hidden objects in hand-drawn, interactive landscapes. Ignite your imagination, unleash your inner artist with the editor and share your masterpieces with the world!

THREE ERAS TO DISCOVER
Dive into three captivating eras: Victorian elegance, Noir mystery, and Sci-fi wonder. Test your keen eye and unravel the mysteries hidden within each intricate scene. Can you uncover every secret the past (and future) holds?

CREATE YOUR OWN WORLDS
Unleash your creativity with the map editor! Craft your own worlds filled with wonders and surprises. Select assets from different eras, populate your creation with characters, and watch your imagination come to life.

PLAY & SHARE
The adventure doesn't end with the campaign! Join the online community and explore a plethora of user-generated maps. Delve into captivating worlds, seek out hidden objects, and share your favorite discoveries with fellow adventurers.

Features
- Immerse yourself in relaxing gameplay with no timers to rush your exploration
- Travel through time and uncover hidden secrets in beautifully hand-drawn landscapes
- Design your own maps using the intuitive map editor
- Decode cryptic hints to aid you on your quest
- Enjoy a soothing soundtrack as you lose yourself in the art of discovery
70010000084398.intro: Discover, create and share worlds with your own hidden treasures!
70010000084398.name: Hidden Through Time 2: Discovery

70070000023297.description:
Get ready for to embark on the thrilling adventure of a lifetime as you assume the role of a skilled bus driver, navigating through the bustling city and ensuring passengers reach their destinations on time! Now your journey is set to become even more exhilarating because just got a major upgrade, thanks to our new Bundle Bus Simulator 2024: City Driver - Premium Edition, Consists of the main game and the latest DLC

Here's why you won't want to miss out:
	•	$150,000 Cash Boost: Kickstart your journey with a hefty cash injection, instantly elevate your city driving experience.
	•	Explore a Vibrant Open-World: Navigate a meticulously crafted metropolis.
	•	17 Unique Buses: Use your cash boost to expand and upgrade your fleet, each bus with its own unique features.
	•	Boost Your Earnings: Pick up passengers and watch your profits soar.
	•	Immersive Gameplay: Enjoy dynamic AI, stunning graphics, and realistic bus physics
Jump on board and feel the thrill of the city streets with the our new bundle that makes you test the most exciting sensations
70070000023297.intro: Maximize your profits, upgrade your fleet and enjoy Immersive gameplay with our with the complete bus driving premium bundle!
70070000023297.name: Bus Simulator 2024: City Driver - Premium Edition

70010000053945.description:
Max has always been the more unhinged member of the Freelance Police—a lovable lunatic with a knack for spreading chaos wherever he goes. But recently his abilities have taken a supernatural turn.
It all started when he stumbled upon a mysterious toy that allows him to glimpse the future. Now Sam & Max have aroused the attention of a host of villains from across the galaxy who are hellbent on acquiring the magical Toys of Power to achieve their own ends.
As those who seek the Devil’s Toybox close in and Max’s psychic abilities grow beyond his control, the Freelance Police will come up against their most frightening adversary yet: the power of Max’s mind.
Explore odd locales, meet eccentric characters, and solve brain-tickling puzzles in this bizarre paranormal adventure with a surprise around every corner. Jump into Max’s brain and use the Toys of Power to see the future, teleport, and read minds. 
Sam & Max: The Devil’s Playhouse has been lovingly remastered by members of the original team, with lighting, lip-sync, cinematography, music, and more updated and enhanced to bring Telltale’s acclaimed game up to modern standards. See the episodic Sam & Max series through to its epic conclusion!
70010000053945.intro: The final game in Telltale’s Sam & Max trilogy, beautifully remastered!
70010000053945.name: Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse

70010000081083.description:
One day, their peaceful existence is disrupted by the sudden appearance of a computer virus that threatens all sentient programs. Ash takes on the role of a detective to unravel the mystery of this virus.

You can switch between Ash and his virtual assistant. Only one character can access certain locations.

- Complete tasks and get paid for them
- Create items in the generator
- Monitor your mental health
- Fantastic adventures and an unexplored world await you
- Work in tandem with your assistant
- Find out what's really going on
- Expose the criminal
70010000081083.intro: Cat's Request is a fantastic detective story about an extraterrestrial cat named Ash and his virtual assistant, living in a metropolis governed by artificial intelligence.
70010000081083.name: Cat's Request

70010000082373.description:
Get ready for retro vertical shoot’em up action where you’ll face off against swarms of mythical insect baddies using shuriken, bombs and more in the ultimate fight for survival! Switch between spread and focus shot types, unlock 4 unique hoverbikes, pick up coins and permanently upgrade weapons to stack the deck in your favor for the next exciting run.

The more you play, the stronger you get! Stage elements are randomized to keep you on your toes across uniquely themed levels, each with dedicated original background music! Take down 6 unique boss types and challenge online leaderboards. Can you become a true ninpo master?

Tiny Pixels Vol. 1 - Ninpo Blast is the first in a line of pixel art titles inspired by arcade and console classics!

Features:

• Master bullet hell stages against swarms of insect baddies!
• Easily switch between focus or spread shot types.
• Collect coins to buy permanent upgrades, making you more powerful for future runs.
• Unlock new hoverbike skins to customize the experience!
• Face off against 6 big boss types and challenge online leaderboards.
• Enjoy unique background music and graphical themes across multiple stages!
70010000082373.intro: Jump on your hoverbike and blast off for unlimited ninja-themed bullet hell mayhem!
70010000082373.name: Tiny Pixels Vol. 1 - Ninpo Blast

70010000054300.description:
New to the 8-bit gaming scene, it’s Space Raft!

Wait, what?

Yes, Milwaukee’s hungriest band Space Raft is now in an 8-bit adventure.

Join the band on their quest to retrieve the master tapes of their new record "Positively Space Raft" from the clutches of their jealous ex-bass player Srini!

Get behind the wheel of the Space Raft Van and steer the band past obstacles while navigating through traffic. Take control of your favourite band member and clear the screen of sandwiches to thwart the plans of the meddling Srinimania!

An 8-bit adventure designed specifically for music lovers! Recover the stolen master tapes! Release the new Space Raft record! Road trip!

– Soundtrack featuring chiptuned songs from ‘Positively Space Raft’!
– Recognisable people and places from the Milwaukee independent music scene, including DMR alumni!
– Six obstacle-based scrolling stages!
– Fifteen arcade-style music venue stages!
– Two huge dungeon levels!
– Four playable characters with unique abilities!
– Sound Test screen with a playable drum kit!
– Boss fights!
– Minifridge!
– The Sandwich!
70010000054300.intro: Embark on a rock 'n' roll 8-bit adventure with Space Raft and save the music!
70010000054300.name: Space Raft

70010000064958.description:
Enter the breathtakingly beautiful world of Arco, a unique tactical action game where your decisions shape the story. Journey through lush forests, sweeping plains, and scorching deserts as you guide four unlikely heroes in their vendetta against the Red Company gang. Battle warriors of different nations, fend off greedy colonisers, and slay monstrous creatures as you voyage across this enchanted land. Change your fate, one move at a time.

Features: 
- Cleverly plan your next move in a unique, “simultaneous turn-based” combat system.
- Unlock new game-changing skills, recruit powerful allies, and collect life-saving resources as you progress.
- Progress through each campaign as a different character with their own set of special abilities.
- Dive into a tale full of danger and excitement and watch it unfold from multiple viewpoints.
- Explore a fantastical world brought to life by evocative pixel art and an atmospheric score.
70010000064958.intro: Three tales forged in bloodshed, laced with magic, and united by revenge.
70010000064958.name: Arco

70010000070681.description:
Phantom Spark is an exhilarating high-speed racing game that will test your limits. Push for your best time in precision time-trial races across three domains full of otherworldly architecture. Take on challenges, hone your skills, and master the pathways to surpass the champions.

Light The Spark
Pushing you forward in the single-player campaign, you have the domain champions. Giving you the drive to set ever-faster times, acting as both guides and opponents. As you best each champion, and your spark strengthens, you will unlock new pathways and ships.

Hone Your Skills
Competing against ghost opponents allows you to see the current best time in action, letting you improve your racing line and find those extra fractions of a second. With instant restarts, you stay in the rhythm, keeping focus as you refine your times on each pathway. 

Online Play
See how you measure up against the best in the world and your friends with online leaderboards. Forge rivalries and seek to be the best as you master over 30 unique pathways.

Light The Spark
Each region has its own Champion who will push players to evolve and adapt upon their best time in the single-player campaign, encouraging competition even in single-player mode.

Hone Your Skills
You’ll be able to race against your own ghost and analyse each twist and turn in the effort to increase your speeds, unlock challenges and cosmetics for your ship as you discover new tracks winding through the ruins of this forgotten world.
 
Online Play
The competition never ends - play against the best in our online leaderboards and against your friends. Forge rivalries and become the best as you hone your skills on over 30 unique tracks.

Key Features
- Over 30 tracks and challenges built to be replayed as you improve your skills.
- Race against each region Champion to encourage competition even in single-player.
- Distinct regions, each boasting unique themes alongside a mesmerising soundtrack.
- Online leaderboards to get you charged up and ready to race!
- Showcase your best times with our replay feature.
70010000070681.name: Phantom Spark

70010000071827.description:
===================== 
Highlights
===================== 
* Explore 10 unique and sandbox-y levels
* Customize your crow with cute hats, scarves, and more
* Use variety of tools and objects you pick up
* Eat delicious foods and discover new "poop modes"
* Make new animal friends and help them out

===================== 
Did you know: Crows are really curious birds?  
===================== 
In this level-based, sandbox-y adventure game, you must become the coolest bird in town and earn the trust of new animal friends. Completed tasks to slowly build up your Crowputation across diverse settings, such a quaint French Riviera, Ancient Egypt, or bustling New York. Some tasks will test your skill, some will test your intellect, and some are honestly just really dumb. Pick and choose the most fun ways to create Adorable Chaos™ - there's something for everyone here!

Spread your wings and soar to new heights of cuteness as you customize your adorable crow-tastic appearance!

===================== 
Did you know: Crows are one of few creatures to use tools?  
===================== 
In "Just Crow Things", you can live out all your crowy fantasies. Pick up all sorts of objects and make good use of them, like a leafblower to (literally) blow people a way, a graffiti can to mark your territory, or a blow torch to... uhh... warm people up at night. Yup. That's, uuh, that's totally the intended use here.

And don't forget the different poop modes, from glitter bombs to ~spicy~ poops...

======= Did you know: Crows achieve highest academic scores on standardized tests? ======= 
Ok, we might be fudging some data here... but the point stands! The game will give you a number of optional side tasks to challenge you further - find all the hidden hats and skins, beat racing challenges across the world, and unlock a special Sandbox Mode where you can spawn all sorts of tools of mayhem.

Anything is possible when you're a crow!
70010000071827.intro: You're a little crow trying to prove herself to the world. Make new animal friends, poop on unsuspecting hoomans, and steal all the shiny trinkets!
70010000071827.name: Just Crow Things

70010000075087.description:
Use your creativity and imagination to solve charming physics puzzles by drawing a single shape and watching what unfolds! Complete the objectives of 250 puzzles (with more on the way), each with multiple and often surprising solutions. How you draw your solution is up to you!

Solve puzzles and earn rewards to build your very own Squiggletown! Unlock buildings, cosmetics and various upgrades as you expand your own personal city.

Squiggle Drop Features:
- 250 levels
- Regular Content Updates
- Daily Challenges
- Challenging your friends to beat your scores
- Earn Achievements
70010000075087.intro: Draw shapes to solve physics puzzles! Over 250 levels each with their own unique objective. Put your brain to the test.
70010000075087.name: Squiggle Drop

70010000077646.description:
You will discover unknown, giant, and beautiful environments and you will be able to enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beauty and little secrets.
Within every area of the world, you must find a certain amount of memory shards to remember the path that leads to your destination and advance with the story. Once you have found all the memory shards you are free to explore the next area.
70010000077646.intro: You play as a little bird-like spirit that watches ancient civilizations evolve.
70010000077646.name: Aery - Ancient Empires

70010000080659.intro: Welcome to the arcade world of battle tanks! Get into the tank, go to the battlefield and complete all combat missions!
70010000080659.name: Arcade Tanks World: Tank Battle Simulator

70010000083022.description:
Play the young witch Flora and discover a bustling town in this Metroidvania-inspired wholesome cooking game. Cook meals and potions in your customized kitchen by carefully selecting the right ingredients. Navigate the town in casual platforming to meet the townsfolk, take up their orders, and learn about this world of magic. 

Flora travels to a distant town to fulfill her dream of becoming a proper witch. She opens up shop in Grat, a harbor town built upon cliffs, where adventurers settled to chart an unexplored island full of mystery. As she engages in the town’s thriving economy, she stumbles upon two members of opposing covens. The witch Cassia and the magus Tauno have a lot to teach Flora, but they also know how to use her in their dispute about magical beings.
70010000083022.intro: Learn new ways to traverse, discover secrets, and experience a unique witchy world.
70010000083022.name: Magical Delicacy

70010000083445.intro: You are immersed in a world of creativity and self-expression, where everyone can become a real artist in the colouring book simulator!
70010000083445.name: Amazing Drawing: Coloring Book Simulator

70010000084774.description:
Welcome to Parking Masters, where you'll face the ultimate test of your parking skills in a variety of challenges! Maneuver vehicles through numerous levels, all designed with realistic physics and a captivating visual style.

Features include

- Extensive levels: Immerse yourself in a variety of parking scenarios with a wide range of challenges to overcome.
- Realistic physics: Prepare for the ultimate parking experience! You'll feel like a real parking pro as you navigate through a variety of vehicles and environments.
- Authentic Vehicle Handling and Dynamics: Feel the thrill of real-world vehicle control as you master each level.
- Unique Visual Style: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning world that's both distinctive and captivating.
- Smooth gameplay: Enjoy smooth and responsive controls that ensure a seamless and enjoyable gaming experience.
- Diverse Vehicles: Drive and park a variety of vehicles, each with its own unique driving characteristics.
- Varied environments: Navigate through a spectrum of parking locations.
- Achievements and Rewards: Unlock achievements and rewards as you triumph over each level and advance through the game!

Take on the challenge and see if you have what it takes to become the ultimate parking master!
70010000084774.intro: Face the ultimate test of your parking skills!
70010000084774.name: Parking Masters

70010000085779.description:
Dive into the immersive world of retail management with Ultimate Fishing Supermarket Simulator 3D! Step into the shoes of a savvy entrepreneur and become the proud owner of a bustling fishing shop. Cater to the needs of passionate anglers as you stock your store with an extensive array of fishing gear, equipment, and accessories.

Key Features:
Manage Your Store: Run your very own fishing supermarket, buying goods at competitive prices and selling them for a profit.

Upgrade and Expand: Use your profits to upgrade your store, expand your inventory, and attract more customers.

Realistic 3D Environment: Experience a detailed and immersive 3D world that brings your fishing supermarket to life.

Strategic Planning: Balance supply and demand to maximize your profits and grow your business empire.

Customer Satisfaction: Keep your customers happy with a diverse range of high-quality products and exceptional service.

Whether you're a fan of fishing or just love business simulation games, Ultimate Fishing Supermarket Simulator 3D offers a unique and engaging experience that will keep you hooked for hours. Start your journey as a fishing market tycoon and reel in the profits today!
70010000085779.intro: Are you ready to build your fishing supermarket empire?
70010000085779.name: Ultimate Fishing Supermarket Simulator 3D

70050000050875.description: Embark on a thrilling trucking journey with 50 new levels designed specifically for the ultimate parking experience! Each level presents unique challenges as you maneuver through tight spaces, sharp turns, and intricate layouts with different types of trailers. Whether you're threading the needle in a tight parking space or carefully backing, your skills will be pushed to the limit. Get ready to park like a pro and prove you have what it takes to handle the biggest rigs on the road!
70050000050875.name: Parking Masters - Big Rig

70050000050876.description: Take on the role of a bus driver in 50 all-new parking levels! Each level challenges you to maneuver your bus into increasingly difficult spaces, honing your ability to maneuver a large vehicle with finesse. Each level is designed to test and improve your parking skills. Are you ready to perfect your parking skills and become the ultimate bus driver?
70050000050876.name: Parking Masters - Bus Driver

70070000023482.description:
Welcome to Parking Masters, where you'll face the ultimate test of your parking skills across a vast array of challenges! Maneuver cars, trucks, buses, and vehicles with trailers through numerous levels, all designed with realistic physics and a captivating visual style.

This package includes:
- Parking Masters
- Parking Masters - Big Rig DLC
- Parking Masters - Bus Driver DLC

With the addition of 2 DLCs, take on 100 additional levels that push your precision to the limit as you maneuver large vehicles with finesse and control.

Parking Masters Deluxe Edition offers a realistic and rewarding experience for all parking enthusiasts. Are you ready to prove your mastery and become parking champion?
70070000023482.name: Parking Masters Deluxe Edition

70010000077271.description:
Welcome to Elrentaros, a hinterland town far from the Melvanian capital.
Visiting on a journey, you mingle with the colorful locals
and embark on a quest to find ways to help them.
But your adventure takes a sudden turn when a strange light surrounds you and you wake in a different realm.
Could this be the real universe?
Unravel the secret of the two worlds!


Choose your protagonist, male or female,
and forge deep connections with the people of Elrentaros as you make conversation, listen to their troubles, and come to their aid.
There are ten ""partner characters"" to form bonds with.
Giving gifts to partners can deepen your friendships and unlock battle ""alliances"" in return.
Grow closer, and they might even invite you home for dinner or visit your tent to talk.

When you gain weapons and armor through alliances and dungeon raids, you can combine them into arsenal ""builds"" to tackle the dungeons as they grow ever more formidable!

Cleared dungeons can be faced again at higher ""challenge levels"" to snag better gear.
Tougher dungeons offer higher-spec weapons and armor, so keep taking them on to find your ultimate build!

Unravel the mysteries of your travels between realms and save Elrentaros from a terrible fate with the help of your new friends!
70010000077271.intro:
A new fantasy × reality adventure begins!
Introducing the all-new action RPG, Elrentaros Wanderings!
70010000077271.name: Elrentaros Wanderings

70010000079644.description:
You are a space mining apprentice with a bright future ahead. However, your superior Commander Neek would rather watch a movie than teach you anything. Can you collect crystals and survive on your own?

Take control of your seeker and become the space miner you always wanted to be.
Turn grid squares to destroy enemy drones before they destroy you.
Solve space-themed puzzles and try to survive!

Features:
- Space-themed puzzles with real-time-strategy elements
- 2-hour-long single-player campaign
- Endless Mode: Play generated levels with seed numbers and unlockables
- Challenge Mode: Try to beat remixed campaign levels
- Chill soundtrack by Muddasheep featuring KAON and Veven
- Character art by Elhyana Guillaume
70010000079644.name: Turn to Mine

70010000081303.description:
Embark on an action-packed adventure in Castaway, diving players into a pixelated and retro universe. Assume the role of Martin, whose spaceship crash-landed on an uncharted island where his faithful pet was taken by hostile creatures. Retrieve your weapons and venture out to rescue your kidnapped companion in this endearing and unexpectedly dynamic world.
Beat the 3 bosses in the concise and delightful "Story Mode" to unlock the thrilling and addictive "Survivor Mode." Ascend a 50-floor tower, with each level presenting increasingly challenging trials!

KEY FEATURES:
• From the "pacifist" mode without enemies or “invincible” to the challenging "unfair" mode, Castaway caters to all ages, from seasoned gamers to younger players discovering the genre for the first time. Try to complete the game as quickly as possible thanks to the speedrun mode!
• Charming Pixel Art Graphics: Immerse yourself in a 2D retro pixel art world reminiscent of classic adventure games. It'll feel like coming home!
• Unique Weapon Abilities: Solve puzzles by acquiring weapons with distinct characteristics - the sword for speed, the pickaxe for power, and the grappling hook for increased mobility.
• Enchanting Soundtrack: Enjoy chiptune melodies, whether heroic or haunting, paying homage to the 8-bit console era!
70010000081303.name: Castaway

70010000081893.description:
Prepare yourself for an adrenaline-pumping experience in Cup Killer, where every object around you becomes a weapon. Face relentless waves of enemies and showcase your strategic prowess in this action-packed game.
        Navigate the battlefield as enemies attack in waves. Disable them by breaking their legs or arms, each decision crucial to your survival. Use environmental objects and enemy body parts as improvised weapons, but keep moving to find new ones as they won't last long.
        Score points with every enemy you defeat, unlocking an arsenal of powerful weapons with effects like freezing, explosions, armor penetration, and multi-shot capabilities. Start on the base map and defend yourself against increasingly challenging waves, earning points to unlock new locations and gear.

Key Features:
	•	Dynamic Enemy Mechanics: Disable and disarm enemies creatively.
	•	Interactive Environment: Turn everything around you into a weapon.
	•	Evolving Arsenal: Unlock and upgrade powerful weapons with unique effects.
	•	Endless Waves of Enemies: Test your endurance and strategy against relentless attackers.
Step into the chaos of Cup Killer and prove your mettle. Every throw, every tactic, every kill brings you one step closer to becoming the ultimate survivor. Are you ready for the challenge?
70010000081893.intro: Transform every object into a weapon master the art of warfare and rise to victory in Cup Killer!
70010000081893.name: Cup Killer - Sandbox Game

70010000083299.description:
Navigate through an overfilled parking lot and move cars out of the way to help them all escape! 

The thought of a parking jam can be overwhelming at first, but don't worry—with a bit of strategy and quick thinking, you can clear the traffic jam and free the cars!  

This parking lot has many vehicles, including small cars, trucks, and SUVs. The jams get increasingly more complicated with each level. Show off how smart you are by clearing them all! 

Try your luck in 5 different game modes:  
•  Parking Jam - Feel the satisfaction of clearing a traffic jam  
•  Challenges - Move cars to free the special vehicle  
•  Boss Levels - Show off your skills with limited moves  
•  Lot Management - Think quickly to take the cars to their lots  
•  Hexa Parking - Feel brilliant by solving unique puzzles 

Features: 
- face over 350 levels!  
- play in five game modes: Parking Jam, Challenges, Boss Levels, Lot Management, and Hexa Parking 
- face off against a friend in local multiplayer mode!   
- complete levels to unlock new maps 
- use powerups to disable hurdles, freeze people, destroy vehicles, and crush entire lanes! 
- collect keys and open prize chests 
- earn coins and spend them on car skins, powerups and trails 

See what it takes to clear the traffic jam and escape the parking lot!
70010000083299.intro: Can you get your car out of a jammed parking lot? Let's find out!
70010000083299.name: Parking Jam

70010000083376.description:
"I remember getting the call vividly. I was trying to finish up for the day, but a stack of paperwork was keeping me late. To be honest, I was also looking for reasons not to go home. My phone rang, I answered it, and the director of the institute was talking, albeit disjointedly, about something that had turned up in a recent survey of The Sirena Deep."

OVERVIEW

Explore a mysterious, abandoned underwater facility at the bottom of the Mariana trench. Who built it? What was it used for? Perhaps you will find answers, or perhaps the answers will find you.

THIS IS A SHORT GAME

You can play through The Sirena Expedition in about an hour. However, there may be some hidden content, for those willing to look for it.

∙ A 2.5D platformer with retro-inspired visuals.
∙ Tense underwater atmosphere and horror.
∙ Innovative puzzle mechanics.
∙ Fully voiced dialogue.
∙ Original soundtrack by beee girlll & Giraffe Cat.
70010000083376.intro: The Sirena Expedition is a short retro-style horror-platformer in which you explore a mysterious underwater facility.
70010000083376.name: The Sirena Expedition

70010000083736.description:
Monsters have attacked the city, and only Ninja can stop them! Grab your sword and double jump, wall-climb and otherwise precision platform your way from your home, all the way to the dark depths where the source of this evil resides...

• Nine worlds of carefully crafted ninja platforming!
• Rad boss fights!
• Died? Rewind at any time, if you'd like! (this difficulty feature can be toggled on/off)
• Stylish limited color palette. Black to white, and red!
• An authentic chiptune soundtrack!
• A fun story delivered through full screen, hand drawn cutscenes!
